scripts.gen:doc:workflow: cd site-vel && bash runCmd.sh php bin/console app:DumpWorkflow > workflow.mmd && docker run --rm -u `id -u`:`id -g` -v ./:/data minlag/mermaid-cli -i workflow.mmd -o test.png && mv test.png ../slides/images/workflow.png && rm workflow.mmd
scripts.gen:doc:diagram-bdd: cd site-vel && bash runCmd.sh php bin/console doctrine:diagram && cd code && mv database.svg ../../slides/images/database.svg
